medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse abdominal pain for one month.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began one month ago and have been progressive. Patient underwent CT scan and RUQ ultrasound which showed cholelithiasis and a thickened wall.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diabetes mellitus type 2, hypertension, dyslipidemia, end-stage renal disease on dialysis, atrial flutter/atrial fibrillation s/p ablation, history of prostate cancer treated with orchiectomy and hormone therapy, renal cell cancer s/p right nephrectomy, secondary hyperparathyroidism.
medical_history.family_history: Siblings are reportedly healthy, but unsure about the health of other family members.
